nodeList.loreText: The bones of many: divided in life, united in death.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Summons a bone golem, which attacks slowly, but retaliates with a bone nova when it takes 100 damage.

nodeList.description: Your Golem moves and attacks faster.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Your golems have [7%] increased movement speed and melee attack speed per point.

node.loreText: The bones of many: divided in life, united in death.
node.nodeDescription: Summons a bone golem, which attacks slowly, but retaliates with a bone nova when it takes 100 damage.

nodeList.description: Your Golem has a chance to ignite enemies. Golem also has higher fire resistance and deals more damage over time (multiplicative with other modifiers).
nodeList.nodeDescription: Bone golems have [10%] chance to ignite on hit with melee attacks per point, [10%] increased damage over time per point, and [100] Fire Protection per point

nodeList.altText: {Fire Aura} deals 12 fire damage to nearby enemies each second.

Your pyre golems' fire aura has [30%] increased area of effect per point.

node.description: You summon a {Pyre Golem} instead of a Bone Golem. Pyre Golems have a {Fire Aura} that deals 12 fire damage to nearby enemies each second and Pyre Golemsâ€™ melee hits ignite enemies.
node.nodeDescription: Summons a Pyre Golem instead.\n\nPyre Golem has a fire aura which deals 12 fire damage per second to nearby enemies. Pyre Golem has 100% additional chance to ignite on melee hits.

nodeList.description: Your Golem has significantly higher armour for the first 15 seconds of their life when summoned near the corpse of another Golem.
nodeList.nodeDescription: If you summon a golem within 18 metres of the corpse of another golem, your new golem gains [200] armour, elemental protection, void protection, necrotic protection, and poison protection per point for 15 seconds.

nodeList.nodeDescription: Triples the chance for a retaliatory bone nova when your bone golems are hit by you or your allies.
